com.gridgraph.storage

Interface IMessageStorage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGraphStorage, IPageRankMessageStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphStorage, HeapGraphStorage, PageRankMessageStorage, RemoteGraphStorage, RemotePRMessageStorage

    public interface IMessageStorage
    Interface to represents GridGraph messages storage which is used for a graph computing The IMessageStorage interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to supports a GridGraph computing messages persistence.
    The concept of the message storage keeps align with relational database, thus table creation/dropping are supported. The underlying implementation class may internally support the interface as a file, in-memory storage, etc.
    Author:
    guobao.chen

      Putting/writing an array of computing messages to persistence table, by specifying vertex related to the messages, and the messages array representing a group of messages sending/receiving to/from a vertex
      Object[] queryComputingMessage(String tableName, long vertexId)
      Querying/reading an array of computing messages from persistence table, by specifying vertex related to the messages

        Putting/writing an array of computing messages to persistence table, by specifying vertex related to the messages, and the messages array representing a group of messages sending/receiving to/from a vertex
